alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 07 at 10:38AM PST until January 09 at 9:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PST MONDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...San Diego County Deserts. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM PST this evening. For the Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 9 AM PST Monday and Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
